name: Materials Science | Materials Science 2019 | Materials Science Conferences | Materials Science Congress | Materials Science and Engineering Conferences
content: To explore, learn new researches and to share knowledge in their respective fields science access is organizing “3rd Annual Conference on Materials Science and Engineering “(Materials Science 2019) which is going to be held at Rome, Italy during October 23-25, 2019 and providing a global platform for professors, engineering, young researches, students, industrialists in the areas of materials science, materials engineering, ceramic engineering, nanotechnology, polymer engineering to share their research experiences and indulge in interactive discussions and special sessions at the event. Material Science 2019 paves a platform to globalize the research by installing a dialogue between industries and academic organizations and knowledge transfer from research to industry. At Materials Science 2019, attendees will gain insights on recent advances, new challenges, and the roadmap for overcoming them, giving them the opportunity to discuss and influence actual trends in the field.
